MAINFIRST –
EMERGING MARKETS CORPORATE BOND FUND BALANCED
MainFirst Emerging Markets Corporate Bond Fund Balanced is a corporate bond fund that focuses on undervalued emerging market companies offering the potential for substantial returns after performing an extensive credit rating review (top-down and bottom-up analyses). The risk-return profile of all positions promises attractive returns, especially in a low interest rate environment. The aim is to achieve long-term capital growth based on a similar level of overall risk and to consistently outperform the benchmark index.

MainFirst Asset Management
@mainfirstassetmanagement

MAINFIRST is an independent European multi-investment boutique with an active management approach. The company manages its own mutual as well as special funds in the following asset classes: equities, bonds, and multi-asset. The Portfolio Management teams act independently in the implementation of their investment ideas and consistently follow their respective investment strategies and philosophies. This approach, combined with an authentic corporate culture, provides the optimal basis for generating alpha and creating long-term value for our investors. Sustainability aspects are explicitly incorporated into all MainFirst funds and are fully integrated into the decision-making process for active security selection. In this way, the company combines the expertise and flexibility of focused investment teams with the strengths and clearly defined processes of a broad-based international platform.

MAINFIRST –
GLOBAL EQUITIES UNCONSTRAINED FUND
MainFirst Global Equities Unconstrained Fund is a thematic global equity fund that pursues a growth approach without employing short-term hedging. It focuses on structural growth investment themes, such as digitalisation or automation. When it comes to the stock selection process (bottom-up analysis), preference is given to companies exhibiting structural growth. The aim is to outperform the benchmark index in the long term.

MAINFIRST –
GLOBAL DIVIDEND STARS
MainFirst Global Dividend Stars is an equity fund that invests in sustainable equities worldwide. The fund diversifies according to region, sector and market capitalisation (bottom-up analysis) in order to select suitable stocks. The objective is to generate appropriate performance through medium to long-term capital growth and regular distributions.

SUSTAINABLE INVESTMENTS (ESG)
When we hear the word “value”, we don’t just think of financial value, but also of ethical values. The concepts are two sides of the same coin. After all, you have to adopt a forward-looking, conscientious approach if you want to achieve above-average returns in the long term. Our experience shows that investors who take environment, social and governance aspects into account when making decisions fare better in the long term. This is how responsible investment pays off – in every sense of the world.

MAINFIRST –
GERMANY FUND
MainFirst Germany Fund is a German equity fund. Investments are made primarily in hidden champions, i.e. fast-growing, undervalued SMEs that are characterised by fundamental profitability, solid balance sheets and the potential for long-term earnings growth. The aim is to benefit from revaluations and growth potential in the long run.

MAINFIRST –
ABSOLUTE RETURN MULTI ASSET
MainFirst Absolute Return Multi Asset is designed as a global mixed fund. It invests in equities, bonds, currencies and commodities on a global scale. These are selected using a fundamental approach (bottom-up and top-down analysis) with a focus on steady value growth. The fund also uses tactical risk optimisation. The aim is to achieve long-term, positive returns above the 5% mark with a moderate level of risk.

MAINFIRST –
GLOBAL EQUITIES FUND
MainFirst Global Equities Fund is a globally investing equity fund that pursues a thematic investment approach. The approach focuses on structural growth investment themes, such as digitalisation or automation at present. Stocks are selected based on comprehensive company analyses (bottom-up). The fund’s equity and currency allocation can be tactically hedged using futures contracts. The aim is to outperform the benchmark index in the long term.

INVESTOR PROFILE
FUND TEAMS
MainFirst teams are made up of top-class specialists. While others restrict themselves to a benchmark-based approach of tracking popular indices, we opt for individual, actively managed investment strategies. Our portfolio managers have the knowledge, perseverance, determination and experience they need to achieve our common goal: better performance. Keeping a constant eye on positive alpha (excess return), our fund managers act like entrepreneurs, making clear recommendations and only investing in those individual stocks that they are absolutely sure about. This sort of approach calls for prudence, courage and a goal-driven mindset – lateral thinking that translates into straightforward action. That’s how we manage assets with character.

INVESTOR PROFILE
MAINFIRST -
MEGATRENDS ASIA
The MEGATRENDS of tomorrow are emerging in the Far East. Invest specifically and sustainably in Asian topics of the future with MainFirst Megatrends Asia. The theme-based approach focuses on investment themes linked to the opportunity for structural growth - such as digitalization, robots, automation, semiconductors, electric cars, batteries and renewable energies. Invested exclusively in Asia, the fund’s stock selection is carried out via bottom-up analyses, i.e. on the basis of detailed company analyses. In its strategy, the fund follows a growth approach without regional or sectoral specifications. It favours companies that benefit from long-term structural growth.

MAINFIRST –
TOP EUROPEAN IDEAS FUND
MainFirst Top European Ideas Fund is designed as a European equity fund. It invests in promising companies that are expected to generate earnings growth thanks to solid balance sheets, high levels of profitability and forward-looking management. The investment decision is based on an in-depth fundamental analysis – with no sector or country restrictions. The aim is to outperform the benchmark index in the long term thanks to a combination of active management and successful stock picking.

INVESTOR PROFILE
BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT SERVICES
We want to offer our clients the best possible investment solution. But what really is the best possible investment solution? Not every fund is suitable for every investor. This means that the solution has to be tailored to suit the investor’s individual risk profile and specific objectives. This analysis and decision-making process – from the consultation session to purchase – is handled by FENTHUM, our Business Development Services-Partner. They use their expertise and experience to ensure that the investor portfolio is tailor-made – the basis for long-term success.
